title: Minimal Node.js express based application for project kickstarting

content: readme.md express-seedminimal node.js express based application project kickstarting.setup$ npm install yarn -g$ yarn installenvironmentdotenv is supported, create .env filenode_envnode environment, defaults developmentporthttp server port, defaults 3000http_log_configmorgan log configuration, defaults devusagestart:$ yarn starttest:$ yarn testcoverage:$ yarn run coveragelicenselicence Â© rodrigo gomes da silva
